meta.name: keywords
meta.content: loans, financial services, home page, products, services

nav.class: bg-white mx-auto shadow-[0px_10px_60px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)] transition-all duration-500 mt-20 rounded-full

button.class: bg-grees-200 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-800 text-[10px] sm:text-[12px] md:text-[14px] lg:text-[16px]

div.class: text-sm text-gray-400 mt-10 max-w-[1284px] mx-auto px-5 overflow-x-auto

span.class: text-gray-500 font-semibold text-[12px] md:text-[16px] truncate whitespace-nowrap overflow-hidden block flex-grow min-w-0

div.class: flex items-center justify-between mt-4 bg-black px-4 rounded-lg
relative w-10 h-10 flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer z-3

button.class: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white p-1.5 sm:p-2 md:p-3 rounded-full shadow-md sm:shadow-lg shadow-black/30 mr-1 sm:mr-2 md:mr-4

div.class: absolute flex flex-col items-center gap-0 top-20 transition-opacity duration-300 opacity-0

h1.class: text-3xl font-semibold leading-[45px] text-left text-black mb-[10px] max-[570px]:text-[20px] max-[570px]:leading-[30px]

div.class: flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center md: gap-4 bg-gray-100 p-4 rounded-md
col-span-12 lg:col-span-3 px-5 lg:sticky top-20 self-start
bg-black border mt-10 border-[#176ff1] rounded-[24px] max-w-[1240px] mx-auto text-white text-center p-4 mb-12 sm:rounded-[12px]

p.class: text-xl font-semibold mt-2 flex justify-center items-center gap-2

button.class: inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0 bg-blue-630 text-white shadow-sm hover:bg-blue-250 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-3xl

div.class: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-5 max-w-[1240px] mx-auto

p.class: text-xl md:text-2xl font-semibold leading-6 text-black text-left my-4 font-inter

input.class: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500

button.class: w-full px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-white font-medium bg-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed

footer.class: relative bg-grees-300 text-white py-4 px-4 md:px-10

div.class: fixed bottom-0 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 w-[95%] max-w-[1240px] rounded-2xl border border-blue-500 bg-black text-white p-2 shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center justify-between text-center md:text-left opacity-100 translate-y-0 z-[9999]

h2.class: text-[9px] md:text-lg font-semibold flex items-center gap-1

div.class: flex flex-wrap justify-center md:justify-start gap-1 md:gap-2 text-[8px] md:text-sm mt-1 md:mt-0

button.class: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white px-5 py-1 text-[8px] md:text-sm rounded-xl md:rounded-2xl mt-1 md:mt-0

div.class: mt-20 mx-auto grid md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 text-sm

div.p: Registered Address - 5/2/8, Geeta Colony, New Delhi - 110031
Corporate Address - A 12-13, Sector 16, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301

div.class: md:col-span-9 grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8

div.div:
Disclaimer : LoansJagat is India’s 1st debt consolidation loan marketplace and a free service platform that helps users choose the best loan offers from trusted and RBI-regulated banks and NBFCs. We do not sell loans directly, and loan approval is at the sole discretion of the respective financial institution. Backed by a strong tech-based platform and deep financial expertise, we help increase your approval chances and secure the best deals in the industry by matching you with the most suitable lenders. We are on a vision of providing innovative financial solutions that bring peace to humankind.
Important: Never pay any upfront fee for loan processing or disbursal. If anyone claims to represent LoansJagat and asks for money, please report it immediately atsupport@loansjagat.com Read more...

div.class: mt-5 text-center text-[#6f6969] border-t border-gray-700 pt-2
